com.agenarisk.api.model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agenarisk.api.model.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IdContainer<ModelException>, Storable

    public class Model
extends Object
implements IdContainer<ModelException>, Storable
    Model class represents an AgenaRisk model that may contain a number of Bayesian networks, datasets etc, equivalent to com.agenarisk.api.model.Model in AgenaRisk Java API v1.
    Author:
    Eugene Dementiev

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Model.CalculationFlag 
      static class  Model.ConversionFlag 
      static class  Model.ExportFlag 
      static class  Model.Field
      This is set of fields for input/output to XML and JSON format

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void absorb(org.json.JSONObject json)
      Creates all the Model structure from the provided JSONObject.
      void calculate()
      Triggers propagation in this Model for all Networks and DataSets.
      void calculate(Collection<Network> networks, Collection<DataSet> dataSets, Model.CalculationFlag... flags)
      Triggers propagation in this model for provided Networks and DataSets.
      If either is null, all Networks or DataSets will be used instead.
      void convertToStatic(DataSet dataSet, Model.ConversionFlag... flags)
      Make all states of dynamically discretized nodes static as they currently are in the provided DataSet.
      No action will be performed if no nodes are simulated.
      Any VariableObservations in the DataSet will replace current Node variable defaults and will be replaced from the DataSet observations.
      DataSet createDataSet(org.json.JSONObject jsonDataSet)
      Creates a DataSet for this Model from JSON data.
      DataSet createDataSet(String id)
      Creates a new DataSet and adds it to this Model.
      Link createLink(Node source, Node target, CrossNetworkLink.Type type)
      Creates a Link between two nodes in same or different Networks.
      Link createLink(Node source, Node target, State state)
      Creates a CrossNetworkLink of type CrossNetworkLink.Type.State that passes the given state from source Node to target Node.
      Link createLink(String sourceNetworkId, String sourceNodeId, String targetNetworkId, String targetNodeId, CrossNetworkLink.Type type)
      Creates a CrossNetworkLink of given Type.
      Link createLink(String sourceNetworkId, String sourceNodeId, String targetNetworkId, String targetNodeId, String stateLabel)
      Creates a CrossNetworkLink of type CrossNetworkLink.Type.State that passes the given state from source Node to target Node.

      Factory method to create an empty instance of a Model class.

      Factory method to create an instance of a Model from provided JSONObject.

      Creates a Model from a Minerva Model object.

      Creates a Network and adds it to this Model.

      Creates a new empty Network and adds it to this Model.
      Network createNetwork(String id, String name)
      Creates a new empty Network and adds it to this Model.
      org.json.JSONObject export(Model.ExportFlag... flags)
      Returns the Model as a minimal JSON.
      Keeps only elements essential for a clean calculation.
      boolean factorize()
      Performs binary factorization on the model if there are any simulation nodes with more than 3 parents.
      This involves the model being recreated from scratch and all previously held references to pre-existing objects in the Model will become invalid and should be released.
      String getAvailableDataSetId(String prefix)
      Generates a new DataSet ID that is guaranteed to be available at the return time.
      DataSet getDataSet(String id)
      Looks up and returns a DataSet by its ID.
      List<DataSet> getDataSetList()
      Returns DataSets of this Model as a list
      Map<String,DataSet> getDataSets()
      Returns a copy of ID-Network map.

      Returns a copy of ID-Network map.
      Settings getSettings()
      Returns Model Settings object.
      boolean isCalculated()
      Checks whether the model had been successfully calculated and requires no calculation at this time.
      Model is considered calculated if all Networks had been calculated.

      Loads a Model from provided path

      Removes provided Network from this Model, breaks any existing links to and from this Network.

      Removes provided Network from this Model, breaks any existing links to and from this Network.
      void reset()
      Reset the model by removing all Networks, Links, DataSets etc
      void save(String path)
      Saves the Model to a file path specified.
      Output format is determined by path extension:
      • AgenaRisk 7 CMP for "cmp"
      • XML for "xml"
      • JSON for everything else
      void saveEssentials(String path, boolean keepMeta)
      Saves the Model as a light-weight JSON.
      Keeps only elements essential for a clean calculation.
      Drops: Graphics, RiskTable, DataSets, compiled non-manual NPTs, names, notes and descriptions.

      Links this Model to an underlying Minerva Model object.

        public static Model loadModel(String path)
                       throws ModelException
        Loads a Model from provided path
        Parameters:
        path - path to model file
        Returns:
        loaded Model
        Throws:
        ModelException - if failed to read the file; or if JSON was corrupt or missing required attributes; or if CMP could not be converted to JSON

      • createModel

                         throws ModelException
        Creates a Model from a Minerva Model object.
        Parameters:
        api1Model - the logical Minerva Model
        Returns:
        Model object with the provided Minerva Model underneath
        Throws:
        ModelException - if Minerva Model fails to be converted to JSON

      • createModel

        public static Model createModel(org.json.JSONObject json)
                         throws ModelException,
                                org.json.JSONException
        Factory method to create an instance of a Model from provided JSONObject.
        Creates all member components.
        If a DataSet with the provided ID already exists, it will append a number to that ID to make it unique.
        If an observation in DataSet fails to be set, it is ignored and results for that DataSet are not loaded.
        Parameters:
        json - JSONObject representing this model, including structure, tables, graphics etc
        Returns:
        Model created Model
        Throws:
        ModelException - if failed to create any of the components
        org.json.JSONException - if JSON structure is invalid or inconsistent

      • absorb

        protected void absorb(org.json.JSONObject json)
               throws ModelException,
                      org.json.JSONException
        Creates all the Model structure from the provided JSONObject.
        Creates all member components.
        If a DataSet with the provided ID already exists, it will append a number to that ID to make it unique.
        If an observation in DataSet fails to be set, it is ignored and results for that DataSet are not loaded.
        Parameters:
        json - JSONObject representing this model, including structure, tables, graphics etc
        Throws:
        ModelException - if failed to create any of the components
        org.json.JSONException - if JSON structure is invalid or inconsistent

      • createNetwork

        public Network createNetwork(org.json.JSONObject jsonNetwork)
                      throws NetworkException
        Creates a Network and adds it to this Model.
        Creates all member components.
        Note: loading node tables will fail if parent nodes do not exist in the model. In that case load all nodes first without tables and then use setTable(JSONObject) after all nodes, states, intra and cross network links had been created.
        Parameters:
        jsonNetwork - JSONObject representing the network, including structure, tables, graphics etc
        Returns:
        Network object
        Throws:
        NetworkException - if failed to create the Network
        See Also:
        Node.setTable(JSONObject)

      • createNetwork

        public Network createNetwork(org.json.JSONObject jsonNetwork,
                             boolean withTables)
                      throws NetworkException
        Creates a Network and adds it to this Model.
        Creates all member components.
        Note: loading node tables will fail if parent nodes do not exist in the model. In that case load all nodes first without tables and then use setTable(JSONObject) after all nodes, states, intra and cross network links had been created.
        Parameters:
        jsonNetwork - JSONObject representing the network, including structure, tables, graphics etc
        withTables - whether to load node tables from JSON
        Returns:
        Network object
        Throws:
        NetworkException - if failed to create the Network
        See Also:
        Node.setTable(JSONObject)

        public Network createNetwork(String id)
                      throws NetworkException
        Creates a new empty Network and adds it to this Model.
        Parameters:
        id - unique ID of the Network
        Returns:
        the Network instance added to this Model
        Throws:
        NetworkException - if a Network with this ID already exists

        list of Networks

      • getLogicModel

        public uk.co.agena.minerva.model.Model getLogicModel()
        Returns the underlying ExtendedBN.
        Using logic objects directly is unsafe and is likely to break something.
        Returns:
        the underlying ExtendedBN

      • calculate

        public void calculate()
               throws CalculationException
        Triggers propagation in this Model for all Networks and DataSets.
        Throws:
        CalculationException - if calculation failed
        InconsistentEvidenceException - specifically in case inconsistent evidence was detected

      • calculate

        public void calculate(Collection<Network> networks,
                      Collection<DataSet> dataSets,
                      Model.CalculationFlag... flags)
               throws CalculationException
        Triggers propagation in this model for provided Networks and DataSets.
        If either is null, all Networks or DataSets will be used instead.
        Parameters:
        networks - Networks to calculate, can be null for all Networks
        dataSets - DataSets to calculate, can be null for all DataSets
        flags - Calculation flags
        Throws:
        CalculationException - if calculation failed
        InconsistentEvidenceException - specifically in case inconsistent evidence was detected

      • save

        public void save(String path)
          throws FileIOException
        Saves the Model to a file path specified.
        Output format is determined by path extension:
        • AgenaRisk 7 CMP for "cmp"
        • XML for "xml"
        • JSON for everything else
        Parameters:
        path - the file path to save to
        Throws:
        FileIOException - if saving fails

      • export

        public org.json.JSONObject export(Model.ExportFlag... flags)
                           throws AdapterException
        Returns the Model as a minimal JSON.
        Keeps only elements essential for a clean calculation.
        Parameters:
        flags - flags specifying which attributes to keep
        Returns:
        minimal JSON
        Throws:
        AdapterException - if conversion to JSON fails

      • saveEssentials

        public void saveEssentials(String path,
                           boolean keepMeta)
                    throws FileIOException
        Saves the Model as a light-weight JSON.
        Keeps only elements essential for a clean calculation.
        Drops: Graphics, RiskTable, DataSets, compiled non-manual NPTs, names, notes and descriptions.
        Parameters:
        path - the file path to save to
        keepMeta - Keep meta, names, notes and descriptions of Model, Networks and Nodes
        Throws:
        FileIOException - if saving fails

      • createDataSet

        public DataSet createDataSet(String id)
                      throws DataSetException
        Creates a new DataSet and adds it to this Model.
        Parameters:
        id - unique ID of the DataSet
        Returns:
        the DataSet instance added to this Model
        Throws:
        DataSetException - if a DataSet with this ID already exists

      • loadRiskTable

        protected void loadRiskTable(org.json.JSONArray jsonRiskTable)
        Loads Risk Table from JSON into the current Model
        Parameters:
        jsonRiskTable - the Risk Table data

      • loadQuestionnaire

        protected void loadQuestionnaire(org.json.JSONObject jsonQstnr)
        Loads a Questionnaire from JSON
        Parameters:
        jsonQstnr - the Questionnaire data

      • createDataSet

        public DataSet createDataSet(org.json.JSONObject jsonDataSet)
                      throws ModelException
        Creates a DataSet for this Model from JSON data.
        If a DataSet with the provided ID already exists, it will append a number to that ID to make it unique.
        If an observation in DataSet fails to be set, it is ignored and results for that DataSet are not loaded.
        Parameters:
        jsonDataSet - the JSON data
        Returns:
        created DataSet
        Throws:
        ModelException - if a DataSet with this ID already exists or if JSON was corrupt or missing required attributes

      • getDataSets

        public Map<String,DataSet> getDataSets()
        Returns a copy of ID-Network map. Once generated, membership of this map is not maintained.
        Returns:
        copy of ID-Network map

      • getDataSetList

        public List<DataSet> getDataSetList()
        Returns DataSets of this Model as a list
        Returns:
        list of DataSets

      • createLink

        public Link createLink(Node source,
                       Node target,
                       CrossNetworkLink.Type type)
                throws LinkException
        Creates a Link between two nodes in same or different Networks.
        Parameters:
        source - Node to link from
        target - Node to link to
        type - type of CrossNetworkLink; Type can not be CrossNetworkLink.Type.State, use createCrossNetworkLink(Node, Node, String) instead
        Returns:
        created Link
        Throws:
        LinkException - if Link already exists, or a cross network link is being created with invalid arguments

      • createLink

        public Link createLink(String sourceNetworkId,
                       String sourceNodeId,
                       String targetNetworkId,
                       String targetNodeId,
                       CrossNetworkLink.Type type)
                throws LinkException
        Creates a CrossNetworkLink of given Type.
        Parameters:
        sourceNetworkId - ID of source Network of the link
        sourceNodeId - ID of source Node of the link
        targetNetworkId - ID of target Network of the link
        targetNodeId - ID of target Node of the link
        type - type of the message for the link to pass; Type can not be CrossNetworkLink.Type.State, use createCrossNetworkLink(Node, Node, String) instead
        Returns:
        created Link
        Throws:
        LinkException - if both Nodes are in the same Network; invalid Type given, or source Node already has incoming links or if Network with this ID does not exist

      • createLink

        public Link createLink(Node source,
                       Node target,
                       State state)
                throws LinkException
        Creates a CrossNetworkLink of type CrossNetworkLink.Type.State that passes the given state from source Node to target Node.
        Parameters:
        source - source Node of the link
        target - target Node of the link
        state - the state from source Node for the link to pass to target Node
        Returns:
        created Link
        Throws:
        LinkException - if both Nodes are in the same Network; invalid state given, or source Node already has incoming links

      • createLink

        public Link createLink(String sourceNetworkId,
                       String sourceNodeId,
                       String targetNetworkId,
                       String targetNodeId,
                       String stateLabel)
                throws ModelException
        Creates a CrossNetworkLink of type CrossNetworkLink.Type.State that passes the given state from source Node to target Node.
        Parameters:
        sourceNetworkId - ID of source Network of the link
        sourceNodeId - ID of source Node of the link
        targetNetworkId - ID of target Network of the link
        targetNodeId - ID of target Node of the link
        stateLabel - the label of the state from source Node for the link to pass to target Node
        Returns:
        created Link
        Throws:
        ModelException - if both Nodes are in the same Network; invalid state given, or source Node already has incoming links
        NullPointerException - if Network with this ID does not exist

        public org.json.JSONArray getJsonTexts()
        Returns Risk Map texts stored as JSON
        Returns:
        Risk Map texts stored as JSON

      • setLogicModel

        protected void setLogicModel(uk.co.agena.minerva.model.Model logicModel)
        Links this Model to an underlying Minerva Model object. Should only be used while wrapping a new Model around the Minerva Model.
        Parameters:
        logicModel - the logical model

      • getDataSet

        public DataSet getDataSet(String id)
        Looks up and returns a DataSet by its ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the DataSet to return
        Returns:
        the DataSet identified by ID or null, if no such DataSet exists in this Model

      • factorize

        public boolean factorize()
                  throws ModelException
        Performs binary factorization on the model if there are any simulation nodes with more than 3 parents.
        This involves the model being recreated from scratch and all previously held references to pre-existing objects in the Model will become invalid and should be released.
        Returns:
        false if no factorization was required, true if successfully factorized
        Throws:
        ModelException - if failed to factorize

      • removeDataSet

        public boolean removeDataSet(DataSet dataSet)
        Removes the provided DataSet from the model
        Parameters:
        dataSet - DataSet to remove
        Returns:
        true if the DataSet was removed

      • convertToStatic

        public void convertToStatic(DataSet dataSet,
                            Model.ConversionFlag... flags)
                     throws NodeException,
                            AgenaRiskRuntimeException
        Make all states of dynamically discretized nodes static as they currently are in the provided DataSet.
        No action will be performed if no nodes are simulated.
        Any VariableObservations in the DataSet will replace current Node variable defaults and will be replaced from the DataSet observations.
        Parameters:
        dataSet - DataSet to use for creating static states from results
        flags - Conversion flags
        Throws:
        AgenaRiskRuntimeException - if failed to regenerate NPTs after conversion
        NodeException - if failed for other reasons

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the model by removing all Networks, Links, DataSets etc

      • getSettings

        public Settings getSettings()
        Returns Model Settings object.
        Returns:
        Model Settings object

      • isCalculated

        public boolean isCalculated()
        Checks whether the model had been successfully calculated and requires no calculation at this time.
        Model is considered calculated if all Networks had been calculated.
        Returns:
        true if the model is in a calculated state and requires no further calculation

      • getAvailableDataSetId

        public String getAvailableDataSetId(String prefix)
        Generates a new DataSet ID that is guaranteed to be available at the return time.
        Parameters:
        prefix - String to prefix the generated ID
        Returns:
        new available DataSet ID
